Ok thank you, one more question

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ijCsNwTB85Q

At 13:42 Sim Circuit mentions an issue with the load cell not making proper
contact and only being able to get to 40/50kg of force until he fixed it.
Could you confirm if this has been fixed?

I am not technically advanced is the reason I'm asking.

I am planning on buying the Simsonn Pro X Ultra with haptic feedback.

Many thanks for the quick reply


On Mon, Oct 27, 2025 at 1:23 AM service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>

Hi im priv,  This issue is caused by a firmware version mismatch in a small number of control boxes. For affected units, we will first verify the firmware version and then send the correct control box to resolve the force display issue. Please note that this problem only affects the display of force values — the device’s normal operation and performance are not impacted.

Hi thank you, there are multiple listings for the Pro X ultra and Haptic
motors can you confirm which one is the correct or most up to date one?

I want to make sure I'm buying the right products thanks

Pedals

Hi im priv,  Please order it via this link https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0FC6DXZCL, and Amazon's prices include tax; you do not need to pay any additional tax.
